FinServ_Securities__c.name: FinServ_Securities__c
FinServ_Securities__c.description: Represents a security, such as a stock or bond.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies is enabled, contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

CUSIP__c.description: Committee on Uniform Securities Identification Procedures identification number for the securities.

Exchange__c.description: Exchange on which the securities are traded. Valid values: NYSE NASDAQ

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastUpdated__c.description: Timestamp for when data for the securities was last updated by an external data source.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: Name of the securities. Label is Symbol.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the securities record.

SecuritiesName__c.description: Name that uniquely identifies the securities.

SourceSystemId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the securities in an external data source.
